activities: As a provider of corporate housing and temporary housing Oakwood collects information from our guests/clients.  Typically this information would consist of name, phone number, and email address.  We use this information to provide service and notifications to our guests regarding their stay with Oakwood.  If required we will collect credit card information as well.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect personal data that would include name, phone number and email address.  This information may be collected manually or via an online system.
